name: Bearly Fishing
description:
A Ludum Dare 41 game submission

Ever met a hungry bear? Me neither. Ever tried to slap fish midair? Me neither!

Well, I'm happy to be the bearer of good news: BEARLY FISHING is a game exactly for people like us!
The salmon is beary excited to get to the sea - now is the chance to sate your hunger. Place your bears and watch them do their barbearian fishing! Sea what I mean? 

Are those puns getting unbearable? Well then stop reading and start playing! 

Use mouse to control and fish some salmon!

Game by:
Pawgrammer: Alexandru Buhai 
Game Grizzliner and Bugbearer: Andrea Hubertová
Beartist: Daria Bolshikh
